document_data.mainbody:
heesecloth was a form of textile in the Realms so named for its use in cheesemaking.
The primary use of cheesecloth across Faer√ªn was in some styles of cheesemaking, where it was used as a sieve to remove and drain whey from cheese curds. One such style of cheese that utilized cheesecloth in its preparation was farmers cheese. or as a material to wrap food in.
